about_the_game:
The Mothering is a unique extraction looter horror game. No weapons are involved, only your cunning wits and ability to stay away from danger will keep you alive. Go on procedurally generated levels, trying to extract with the necessary items required to complete The Mothering, but be careful not to get caught by the entities that roam the halls.

Key Features:

  • Full inventory management and looting system. Gather materials and craft items to help keep you alive.
  • Randomly generated levels to loot and extract from.
  • Multiple entities to encounter, each with different behaviors and strategies to survive them.
  • A narrative that unfolds as you play. What is The Mothering?
  • Extraction based gameplay. Get out alive or lose everything.
  • Permanent Death Mode for those with nerves of steel.
  • Show your badges of honor with multiple achievements
